channel.title: Working IP ban

item.title: Working IP ban
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

This is what I wrote:

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && command.length() > 6 && playerRights >= 2) { String playerName = command.substring(6); appendToBannedIP(playerName); sendMessage("Successfully banned IP "+command.substring(6)); PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(6); }

What Iâ€™m missing is a proper calling of command.substring(6)'s connectedFrom. My appendToBannedIP writes the connectedFrom, so it should be fine.

Read full topic
